strong.span: At the direction of the Burlington County Department of Health, Medford Township Public Schools will be closed indefinitely until Governor Murphy’s Executive Order 107 is amended or lifted.

h3.span: Please visit our Pandemic Website for up-to-date news and programming information

strong.u: April 27, 2020 Board of Education Meeting/2020-21 Budget Public Hearing

p.strong: The Medford Township Board of Education Regular meeting scheduled for Monday April 27, 2020 at 7:30 P.M. has been modified due to the Coronavirus (COVID-19). The meeting will be stream-cast live using Zoom Conferencing. Members of the public may connect to this stream for video and audio coverage by going to https://zoom.us/j/92009698728?pwd=M1R0VXBUVXd6K0o0dHlWYmdIM3ZGQT09 in their browser (instructions and browser requirements are on their website http://zoom.us). If you are connecting via an app instead of a browser you will need the Meeting ID: 920 0969 8728. Password: 5MTqSV.
Persons wishing to submit comments for the public portion of the meeting may do so electronically by emailing their comments to mgoodwin@medford.k12.nj.us.
The Regular meeting will include a Public Hearing on the proposed 2020-21 Board of Education Budget.

Our website is under construction as a result of its reliance on Adobe Flash and its soon-to-be end of life. We realize that our site is becoming aesthetically unappealing, but rest assured, the content continues to be updated. We are investing time and resources in researching website hosting alternatives and will have a new presence once a thoughtful decision and migration are made. Thank you for your patience and understanding as we look to create an online presence that reflects the wonderful school community it aims to serve.

span.a: BOE Meeting ~ Public Hearing on Budget
